meanings.definition: Small flying insect that bites and feeds on the blood of humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: Mosquitoes buzz around in the evening looking for a meal.
meanings.sent2: I always get itchy bites from mosquitoes during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The mosquitoes at the picnic seemed to enjoy the snacks more than the guests.
meanings.sent4: In the summer, mosquitoes are like tiny vampires, sucking blood to survive.
meanings.sent5: The swarm of mosquitoes near the lake was a nuisance to everyone trying to relax.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the mosquitoes flying above us!
meanings.sent2: The campers were surrounded by mosquitoes as they set up their tents.
meanings.sent3: The mosquitoes in the jar looked like a tiny air force squadron.
meanings.sent4: The mosquitoes in the room multiplied like an army invading a territory.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with mosquitoes, creating a buzzing cloud over the grass.
